--- title: "Let's build a new app!" date: "2022-02-10 21:00:00" --- ![](/img/twitch.jpeg) Let's start building a new app with {golem} and {brochure}.
  • 👨‍💻 Colin Fay, @_ColinFay
  • 🔗 https://www.twitch.tv/thinkr_fr
  • ⏳ __2022-02-10 21:00:00 Paris Time__.
    • See Event in Other Timezones ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} date <- lubridate::ymd_hms("2022-02-10 21:00:00", tz = "Europe/Paris") lubridate::with_tz(date, "UTC") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "2022-02-10 20:00:00 UTC" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} lubridate::with_tz(date, "America/New_York") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "2022-02-10 15:00:00 EST" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} lubridate::with_tz(date, "America/Los_Angeles") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "2022-02-10 12:00:00 PST" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} lubridate::with_tz(date, "Australia/Sydney") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "2022-02-11 07:00:00 AEDT" ``` ::: :::
